pkgmetadata.longdescription: Latent Position and Cluster Models for Statistical Networks // Fit and simulate latent position and cluster models for statistical networks. See Krivitsky and Handcock (2008) doi:10.18637/jss.v024.i05 and Krivitsky, Handcock, Raftery, and Hoff (2009) doi:10.1016/j.socnet.2009.04.001.
